mapper.select: select mb_id from member where mb_id = #{mb_id}
select mb_nickname from member where mb_nickname = #{mb_nickname}
mapper.insert: insert into member(mb_id, mb_nickname, mb_pw, mb_email, mb_division) values(#{member.mb_id}, #{member.mb_nickname}, #{member.mb_pw}, #{member.mb_email}, #{member.mb_division})
